message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $13,000 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your position, but $13,000 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This price still leaves some room for both of us to be happy. Let's make this deal happen!
